      Called by the DS engine when deactivating a component.
      protected void AbstractComponentWithCompendium.defineInnerServicesToBeTracked()
      A method where developer can define which services will be automatically tracked by this component class.

      Called after the activate component method be run.

      Called before the deactivate component method be run.

      protected void AbstractComponentWithCompendium.doBeforeDeactivateComponent()
      Called before the deactivate component method be run.
      protected void AbstractComponentWithCompendium.doRuntimeAnnotationsProcessing()
      This method is a hook that could be used to process the annotations tagged in the component class declaration.
      protected void AbstractComponentWithCompendium.doWhenActivateComponent()
      This method is called by the AbstractComponentWithCompendium.activate(ComponentContext) method in order to complete the activation of the child concrete component.
      protected void AbstractComponentWithCompendium.doWhenDeactivateComponent() 
      protected void AbstractComponentBasic.modified(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext context)
      This is the main activation method of DS components.
      protected void AbstractComponentWithCompendium.openDefinedInnerServiceTrackers()
      Traverse the service tracker list and calls the PluggableServiceTracker.open() method for all instances.
